title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the user is redirected to the login page or authenticated session starts.
Confirm a success message is displayed.

title: User Registration Failure with Invalid Data
description: Ensure registration fails with invalid or incomplete information.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input invalid email format, weak password, or missing fields.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Verify that descriptive validation error messages are shown and registration is blocked.

title: User Login Success
description: Check that users can log in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm user is redirected to the authenticated home or dashboard.
Verify the session is initiated and maintained.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect username/email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify an error message is displayed indicating login failure.
Ensure no session is initiated.

title: Session Persistence and Expiry
description: Validate session persists across app usage and expires appropriately when logged out or timed out.

steps.description: Log in successfully.
Navigate through user dashboard and refresh the page.
Verify user remains logged in and session persists.
Perform logout action.
Confirm session ends and user is redirected to public/home page.

title: Access Control for Company Management
description: Confirm only authenticated users can access and manage company-related data.

steps.description: Attempt to access company management pages when not authenticated.
Verify redirection to login or access denied message.
Log in as a valid user.
Access company management pages.
Verify pages and features load correctly for managing company data.

title: Company Data CRUD Operations
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations function correctly in the company management feature.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to company management section.
Create a new company entry with valid data.
Confirm the new company is listed with correct details.
Update the company information.
Verify the updates are saved and displayed.
Delete the company entry.
Confirm the company is removed from the list.

title: Company Data Validation and Error Handling
description: Ensure validation catches invalid inputs for company data and application handles API errors gracefully.

steps.description: Attempt to submit company data with invalid or missing fields.
Verify appropriate validation messages are shown, and submission is blocked.
Simulate backend API failure during create/update/delete operations.
Check the application shows user-friendly error messages and maintains stable UI.

title: Public Home Page Content and Accessibility
description: Check that the public home page loads for all users and displays accurate content representing product value.

steps.description: Navigate to the application root URL as an unauthenticated user.
Verify the home page loads successfully without errors.
Confirm key informational content and calls to action are present and correct.
Ensure page is responsive and UI follows expected theme and styles.

title: Blog Posts Load and Display
description: Validate blog section loads and displays the latest blog posts with related content correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the blog section of the application.
Verify the list of blog posts loads successfully.
Check each blog post displays correct title, excerpt, and date.
Select a blog post to view full content.
Confirm full post content loads and related posts are displayed.

title: Blog Section Error Handling
description: Ensure the blog gracefully handles missing or corrupted content files and load errors.

steps.description: Simulate corrupted or missing blog content files.
Navigate to the blog list and attempt to open posts.
Verify error messages or placeholder content is shown without crashing.

title: API Integration Data Fetching Success
description: Test API integrations retrieve data correctly using Axios/Fetch and custom hooks.

steps.description: Trigger data fetching actions for user profile, company data, and blog posts.
Validate API calls succeed and data displays correctly in UI components.

title: API Integration Error Handling
description: Validate application gracefully handles API request failures, network errors, and invalid data.

steps.description: Simulate API failures/errors such as 500 server error, 401 unauthorized, and timeouts.
Verify user receives meaningful error feedback without app crash or inconsistent state.

title: Reusable UI Components Rendering
description: Confirm core, data-display, feedback, form, layout, theme, and utility components render consistently and respond to props correctly.

steps.description: Render each reusable component with typical valid properties and states.
Check components visually match design specifications and function as expected.
Test components with edge case props and missing optional props.
Confirm layout and behavior degrade gracefully or show useful defaults.

title: Application Theming and Styles Consistency
description: Verify the application-wide theming and global styles apply correctly across all pages and components.

steps.description: Load various pages and dynamic UI components.
Ensure Tailwind CSS styles, CSS Modules, and theme providers are applied consistently.
Change theme settings if available (e.g. light/dark mode).
Confirm UI updates in real time and style rules persist.

title: Middleware Request Processing
description: Validate middleware correctly intercepts and processes requests, enforcing authentication and routing rules.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected endpoints or pages without authentication.
Check middleware redirects to login or blocks access.
Perform authenticated requests and verify middleware allows passage.

title: Automated Test Coverage Validation
description: Ensure automated tests with Jest cover critical functions: authentication, company management, API integration, UI components, and theming.

steps.description: Run the full automated test suite.
Confirm all critical modules have sufficient test coverage and tests pass.
